title: Kartoffelkuchen
directions: Wash potatoes. Chop the 3 into cubes.  Boil for 15 minutes.
Grate and rinse and rice the other 7 potatoes.  Put aside in a bowl.
Drain boiled potatoes from pot, and mash using ricer into a different bowl than the grated potatoes.
Mix in onions and garlic with the grated potatoes.
Mix flour, breadcrumbs, oil, and spices with mashed potatoes.
Combine them together, and mix well (it takes a while, it is fairly difficult).
a) Spread mixture into oiled baking dish and bake at 325-375 for 50 minutes.
b) Separate into individual patties and fry in a skilled on medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.
